page.title: 19Transport: Rosneath & Rhu
page.content: ROSNEATH: The only public transport is infrequent bus service to Gareloch- head for Helensburgh where trains can be caught for destinations up river and finally Glasgow, the nearest city. Trains at Garelochhead are taken for Oban and Mallaig. Most common form of transport is private car which many people own as essential means of travel to work, social and shopping trips to supermarkets. Teenagers com- plain of no buses after 7.30p.m. and are unable to reach places of entertainment elsewhere. Unless parents willing to transport secondary school children from Hermitage Academy Helensburgh, they are denied partici- pation in extra-curricular activities. RHU: Hourly bus service to and from Helensburgh.
